title: Centene CEO to Retire Amid Activist-Investor Pressure
sub_head: Managed-care providerâ€™s board to be restructured in a deal with activist hedge fund Politan
body:
Managed-care provider Centene Corp. said its long-serving chief executive officer will retire next year and it will name five new board members amid pressure from activist hedge fund Politan Capital Management LP.
Politan, led by investor Quentin Koffey, has been urging Centene to refresh its governance and improve performance.
